title: War, Economic Chaos Defied Drive To End Hunger In 2023: UN
content: Conflict, economic turbulence and extreme weather scuppered efforts to curb hunger last year, with around nine per cent of the world's population affected, UN agencies said on Wednesday.
summary: Conflict, economic turbulence and extreme weather scuppered efforts to curb hunger last year, with around nine per cent of the world's population affected, UN agencies said on Wednesday.

title: Israel's New Raids In Gaza Ahead Of Netanyahu's Address To US Congress
content: Israeli forces carried out new raids in the Gaza Strip on Wednesday, hours before Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was due to address the U.S. Congress.
summary: Israeli forces carried out new raids in the Gaza Strip on Wednesday, hours before Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was due to address the U.S. Congress.

title: These Poisonous Worms Found In Texas Multiply Into 2 When Cut Into Half
content: Heavy rains in the Houston area of Texas have brought out poisonous, foot-long worms that can regenerate if cut in half..
summary: Heavy rains in the Houston area of Texas have brought out poisonous, foot-long worms that can regenerate if cut in half..

title: Bangladesh Eases Curfew, Garment Factories, Banks Re-open After Protests
content: Garment factories and banks reopened in Bangladesh Wednesday after authorities eased a curfew imposed to contain deadly clashes sparked by student protests over civil service employment quotas.
summary: Garment factories and banks reopened in Bangladesh Wednesday after authorities eased a curfew imposed to contain deadly clashes sparked by student protests over civil service employment quotas.

title: Kenyan Journalists Demand Media Freedom Amid Government Restrictions
content: At least 50 people have been killed and more than 400 wounded since the start of the protests on June 18, according to rights groups
summary: At least 50 people have been killed and more than 400 wounded since the start of the protests on June 18, according to rights groups

title: Donald Trump Planning To Stop Holding Outdoor Rallies After Shooting: Report
content: Mr Trump might still make an appearance at smaller outdoor rallies, but they will take place in places like stadiums with strictly restricted admissions.
summary: Mr Trump might still make an appearance at smaller outdoor rallies, but they will take place in places like stadiums with strictly restricted admissions.

title: Anxiety In Older Adults May Triple Risk Of Developing Dementia: Study
content: People with anxiety could be at three times the risk of developing dementia compared to those without anxiety, according to a study.
summary: People with anxiety could be at three times the risk of developing dementia compared to those without anxiety, according to a study.

title: "Heard A Loud Sound And Then...": Witnesses Recount Nepal Plane Crash
content: Recounting the harrowing experience of witnessing the Nepal plane crash that claimed 18 lives the eyewitnesses said that if the plane wouldn't have hit the container, it would have definitely hit the residential area.
summary: Recounting the harrowing experience of witnessing the Nepal plane crash that claimed 18 lives the eyewitnesses said that if the plane wouldn't have hit the container, it would have definitely hit the residential area.

title: 1000 Police Officers Deployed For Football Match Between Israel And Mali
content: A French police source told that security is "expecting actions and disturbances around the stadium" on Wednesday and said it was possible that "people shout insults from the stands" or that there is "whistling and flags shown during the match.
summary: A French police source told that security is "expecting actions and disturbances around the stadium" on Wednesday and said it was possible that "people shout insults from the stands" or that there is "whistling and flags shown during the match.

title: Undeterred By Crackdown, 3,000 Migrants Travel In Caravans To US Border
content: About 3,000 people carrying bags, water and small children trod through intense heat along a highway in southern Mexico on Tuesday, traveling in two groups aiming to reach the US border.
summary: About 3,000 people carrying bags, water and small children trod through intense heat along a highway in southern Mexico on Tuesday, traveling in two groups aiming to reach the US border.

title: Explosion At Tequila Factory In Mexico Kills 5
content: An explosion at a factory producing Jose Cuervo tequila in Mexico killed five people Tuesday, local authorities said.
summary: An explosion at a factory producing Jose Cuervo tequila in Mexico killed five people Tuesday, local authorities said.

title: Australian Woman Gang-Raped By 5 Men In Paris Days Ahead Of Olympics
content: An Australian woman was allegedly gang-raped by five men in Paris just days before the city is set to host the opening ceremonies of the 2024 Olympic Games.
summary: An Australian woman was allegedly gang-raped by five men in Paris just days before the city is set to host the opening ceremonies of the 2024 Olympic Games.

title: Video Shows Out-Of-Control Nepal Plane Slamming Into Ground, Ball Of Fire
content: Aircraft Crash in Nepal Kathmandu: A frightening new video has emerged that captures the final few seconds of the Bombardier CRJ 200 jet that crashed at the Nepal's Kathmandu airport at 11.15 am (local time).
summary: Aircraft Crash in Nepal Kathmandu: A frightening new video has emerged that captures the final few seconds of the Bombardier CRJ 200 jet that crashed at the Nepal's Kathmandu airport at 11.15 am (local time).

title: Nepal Crash Puts Spotlight On Table-Top Runways Risk, India Has 5 Of Them
content: The plane crash in Nepal that left 18 people dead has yet again put the spotlight on table-top runways that have been the site of major plane accidents across the world.
summary: The plane crash in Nepal that left 18 people dead has yet again put the spotlight on table-top runways that have been the site of major plane accidents across the world.

title: Video Shows Exact Moment Plane Crashed At Kathmandu Airport
content: A plane carrying 19 people crashed during takeoff from Kathmandu's Tribhuvan International Airport. The accident resulted in multiple fatalities, with only the pilot surviving the crash.
summary: A plane carrying 19 people crashed during takeoff from Kathmandu's Tribhuvan International Airport. The accident resulted in multiple fatalities, with only the pilot surviving the crash.

title: Nepal Jet That Crashed Was Bombardier CRJ 200, Fuselage In Pieces
content: Eighteen people were declared dead after a plane crashed during takeoff in Nepal's capital Kathmandu today. Authorities have launched a search and rescue operation at the accident site.
summary: Eighteen people were declared dead after a plane crashed during takeoff in Nepal's capital Kathmandu today. Authorities have launched a search and rescue operation at the accident site.

title: Nepal Home To Some Of World's Trickiest Runways
content: A passenger plane carrying 19 people crashed during takeoff in Nepal's capital Kathmandu on Wednesday morning, with fire crews working to douse the flaming wreckage.

title: Meta Unveils Biggest Llama 3 AI Model, Claiming Language And Math Gains
content: The release comes as tech companies are racing to show that their growing portfolios of resource-hungry large language models can deliver significant enough gains in known problem areas like advanced reasoning to justify fundings.

title: Bodycam Footage Shows US Police Fatally Shooting Woman In Her Home
content: The killing of Sonya Massey, 36, over the 4th of July weekend has resulted in criminal charges against the officer who fired the shots.

title: What Hostage Freed From Hamas Captivity Told Benjamin Netanyahu
content: Noa Argamani, an Israeli woman freed from Hamas recently, met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Washington on Monday.
